title: Bug 122584: Cascading parameter values not displayed correctly in HTML viewer
description: Cascading parameter values are not displayed properly in the HTML viewer.
OB: When selecting the first parameter value, the expected behavior is that the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed. However, it is currently not being displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when selecting the first parameter value, the corresponding second parameter value in the cascading group should be displayed in the HTML viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Preview the attached design file in the HTML viewer.
2. Click on the 'change parameter' button in the HTML viewer.
